name: Solar system (itch) (C Mohan)
description:
This is my "Solar system"  project. I have added the following planets in addition to previous game objects. I have also added audio, rotation, and revolution motions to them. 

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars
  4. Jupiter
  5. Saturn 
  6. Uranus
  7. Neptune
  8. Pluto

Credits

Created by C Mohan
